article_node.title: The AI boom's latest job winners: OpenAI is paying nearly $400,000 for a content strategist
article_node.summary: The AI boom is driving up salaries for content professionals, with OpenAI offering up to $393,000 for a content strategist and Meta paying similar levels for a GenAI content engineer. These roles demand extensive experience and AI‑specific skills, reflecting a broader trend of high pay in AI‑exposed industries. The trend is evident across tech firms, from Duolingo to PayPal, and is supported by PwC’s findings that AI talent commands a 56% wage premium. New job titles such as "AI Content Creator" have surged, underscoring the growing value of human creativity in the AI era.
